thread.title: Nice Hotel - Convenient to Madison Square Garden
thread.title_full: Nice Hotel - Convenient to Madison Square Garden - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: elbojbb
title: Nice Hotel - Convenient to Madison Square Garden
text:
Spent a few days here during the Big East Championship week. Price was excellent considering the time of year, and proximity to MSG.
This is one of Apple Cores remakes of an old building, remodeled into a quaint, cramped section of NYC. The rooms are a bit small, but redone quite nicely. Water pressure is excellent, the shower could remove bark from a tree.
Bed was super comfortable, breakfast was just okay (toast, fruit and yogurt) and staff were extremely accommodating and helpful.
Only downside is the noise. Construction noise begins bright and early from adjoining properties, and the doors slam shut quite loudly. Of course, if inconsiderate guests would keep them from slamming, it would be a non-issue.
I don't believe any of the rooms has a decent view of the city, at least mine did not.
Room Tip: Choose a room in the wings of the building, NOT in the main section near the elevators. See more room tips
